response.overview: Growing up poor in Madras, India, Srinivasa Ramanujan Iyengar earns admittance to Cambridge University during WWI, where he becomes a pioneer in mathematical theories with the guidance of his professor, G.H. Hardy.
response.tagline: What does it take to prove the impossible?
response.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity

titles.title: El hombre que conocia el infinito
مردی که بی نهایت را می دانست
